snippet: An Off Broadway musical, “Piece of My Heart,” about the songwriter and record producer Bert Berns, is planned for this summer.
abstract: An Off Broadway musical, “Piece of My Heart,” about the songwriter and record producer Bert Berns, is planned for this summer.

headline.main: Hitmaker's Tunes Lead to Jukebox Musical
headline.print_headline: Hit Maker’s Tunes of ’60s Lead to Jukebox Musical
